name: HuniePop: A Dating Puzzle RPG
blurb: HuniePop is a fully featured dating sim blended with classic puzzle gameplay and enriched by deep RPG systems; for PC, Mac & Linux.

rewards.reward: HUNIEPOP\r\n==============================\r\nThe full retail DRM-free digital copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux! Plus, you will be listed in the credits as a supporter. So simple, so sweet.

HUNIEPOP W/ BONUS\r\n==============================\r\nYou get the full DRM-free digital download of the game, your name in the credits and a stunning collection of Kickstarter exclusive wallpapers featuring the lovely ladies of HuniePop!

HUNIE-PACK\r\n==============================\r\nThe Hunie-pack contains a digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, the wallpaper collection and a digital download of the complete official soundtrack for the game! Please, one at a time!

HUNIE-PACK PLUS\r\n==============================\r\nAll the contents of the Hunie-pack, plus an exclusive digital art book containing beautiful, high resolution artwork from the game as well as concept artwork and promotional artwork.

HUNIE-PACK PRO\r\n==============================\r\nAll the contents of the Hunie-pack Plus, with an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the game's development process that includes sketches, design resources, fun statistics and a series of retrospective discussions revealing the internal and external challenges of creating an independent dating game of this scope. It's all on the table baby!

HUNIE-PACK PREMIUM\r\n==============================\r\nThis is where things start getting physical ;). You get all the digital content from the Hunie-pack Pro, plus a special physical copy of the game (in addition to your digital copy) AND a breathtaking HuniePop promotional poster featuring the gorgeous gals! Included will be a special hand written note thanking you for your supreme awesomeness.
HUNIE-PACK PREMIUM (INTERNATIONAL)\r\n==============================\r\nThis reward tier is the same thing as the Hunie-Pack Premium but with an additional cost to allow shipping outside of the US.

HUNIEPOP HERO!\r\n==============================\r\nThis limited opportunity comes with everything that's included in the Hunie-pack Premium and more. You will get the Love Potion, a special in-game item that will make you irresistible to your girl of choice, you will be mentioned in the game by one of the characters and the project lead will personally call or skype to thank you for your generous pledge! Oh, man!
HUNIEPOP HERO! (INTERNATIONAL)\r\n==============================\r\nThis reward tier is the same thing as the HuniePop Hero but with an additional cost to allow shipping outside of the US.

HUNIEPOP LEGEND!\r\n==============================\r\nThis ultra-limited opportunity includes everything from all previous reward tiers plus a one-of-a-kind custom piece of high resolution artwork featuring you and your favorite girl on a date, painted by a HuniePop artist, just for you! You also get to decide whether or not it's included as part of the Hunie-pack Plus! It just doesn't get any sweeter.
HUNIEPOP LEGEND! (INTERNATIONAL) ============================== This reward tier is the same thing as the HuniePop Legend but with an additional cost to allow shipping outside of the US.

HUNIEPOP GRAND CHAMPION!!\r\n==============================\r\nThe ultimate reward tier comes with everything that is included in the HuniePop Hero reward tier plus the compete set of collectable tissue boxes, all three beautiful wall scrolls and a lovely dakimakura of your choice. It's pretty much everything we have to offer all in one package!

HUNIEPOP GRAND CHAMPION!! (INTERNATIONAL)\r\n==============================\r\nThis reward tier is the same thing as the HuniePop Grand Champion but with an additional cost to allow shipping outside of the US.
